name: lsp-log-streaming-sample
description: A language server example demonstrating log streaming

scripts.compile: npm run compile:client && npm run compile:server

languageServerExample.maxNumberOfProblem.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

languageServerExample.port.description: The WebSocket port to stream LSP log data into.

languageServerExample.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

format.description: Controls the output format of the trace.

verbosity.description: Controls the verbosity of the trace.
